attributes.action: Halt the potential Closure of Grangemouth Stadium-Preserve a Community/NAT Asset
attributes.additional_details: Grangemouth Stadium is more than just a sports facility; it is a vital community asset that contributes significantly to the well-being, recreation, and athletic development of our community. Grangemouth Stadium also stands as not only a vital community asset but also a national facility of great importance to athletics.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, urgently petition Falkirk Council and its elected representatives to reconsider the potential closure of Grangemouth Stadium as part of their strategic property review.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the closure of Grangemouth Stadium are a matter for Falkirk Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
